original: Larsson, Thore Axel Ivar, syssloman, Linköping, f. 7/7/18 i Linköp. Realex. v. Linköp. h. a. 1. 35, DSI 41. Assist, å östergötl. läns landstings kansli i Linköp. 43-45, syssloman v. J. G. Westmans barnb :hus o. epid:-sjukh. i Linköp. 42, syssloman v. det sistnämnda sed. 45. Sekr. i Östg:-kretsen av Sv. sjukh rförvaltn. tj :-mannaförb. sed. 46, kassör i ABFrs i Linköp. gymn rfören. sed. s. å.
translated: Larsson, Thore Axel Ivar, civil servant, Linköping, b. 7/7/18 in Linköping. Completed secondary school in Linköping. Employed at the County Administrative Board in Östergötland from 1935 to 1941. Assistant at the County Council Office in Linköping from 1943 to 1945. Civil servant at J.G. Westman's Children's Home and Epidemic Hospital in Linköping in 1942, and at the latter mentioned institution from 1945. Secretary in the Östergötland district of the Swedish Hospital Administration Service Union from 1946. Treasurer of the ABFrs in Linköping Gymnasium Association from the same year. The abbreviation '\d\d m. partners name' means that the person married in the year 19xx.
